Metadata.title: StudyDemo - Modern Web Application
Metadata.description: A modern web application built with Next.js, featuring internationalization, SEO optimization, and dark mode support.

HomePage.title: Build Modern Web Apps
HomePage.subtitle: with Confidence
HomePage.description: A beautifully crafted starter template featuring internationalization, SEO optimization, and seamless dark mode — everything you need to build world-class web applications.

i18n.title: Internationalization
i18n.description: Built-in multi-language support with next-intl. Seamlessly switch between Chinese and English with locale-based routing.

seo.title: SEO Optimized
seo.description: Dynamic metadata, Open Graph tags, sitemap, robots.txt, and hreflang links ensure maximum search engine visibility.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode
darkMode.description: Elegant theme switching between light, dark, and system modes. Your preference is remembered across visits.

products.title: Medical Products
products.subtitle: High-quality medical solutions, focused on every detail.
